readFastQC allows you to parse reports generated by [FastQC](http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/), a quality control tool for high throughput sequence data.


```{r}

system.file("fastqc_data.txt", package = "readFastQC")

```
